title: Today's Deadline To Sign Franchise-Tagged Players To New Deals
description:
Jordan Cornette and the NFL Live crew discuss today’s deadline for teams to sign franchise tagged players to new deals, how much pressure is on Jalen Hurts this season, the Texans settling with the 30 women who have accused Deshaun Watson of sexual misconduct and when we can expect a ruling on Deshaun Watson.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
